thread.title: Malian hero receives French residency permit after rescuing boy from balcony

title: Malian hero receives French residency permit after rescuing boy from balcony
text:
Malian hero receives French residency permit after rescuing boy from balcony 4:49pm BST - 00:53
The Malian man who rescued a boy from a balcony in France received an official residency permit on Tuesday. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The Malian man who rescued a boy from a balcony in France received an official residency permit on Tuesday. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IUIYTl
